title: Unable to Add Items in the Item Sets Tab
body:
[Client] 

I'm currently unable to drag and drop, or right click items into an existing Item Set using a Macbook pro. When using a PC the Item Set works a usual.

replies.body: There's currently a [known issue](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/bJx6P0hX-known-bugs-in-macos-1012-sierra) with the Sierra updates for mac that's not allowing item lists to save.  The current workaround is saving them on another OS/PC, and then use it on your mac.  Hopefully, that may help in the meantime!
